snippet: An iconic hardware store closes after nearly 100 years in business. Why “Shark Tank” doesn’t represent the real world of investing. And how Urban Outfitters became “the official clothing store of Outrage Twitter.”
abstract: An iconic hardware store closes after nearly 100 years in business. Why “Shark Tank” doesn’t represent the real world of investing. And how Urban Outfitters became “the official clothing store of Outrage Twitter.”

headline.main: Today in Small Business: 30 Start-Ups to Watch
